PAD_FeedButton.synopsis: In Arcane Tower there's a button on the floor near an empty bucket. Pressing the button while wearing Cleric pet's collar drops food (currently blue cheese). Kind of auto-feeding device.This PAD happens on button press. There're variants: player who pressed button wears the collar, and so it just works. Player has it in pocket, then the collar vibrates a little. Another party character nearby has the collar, then that character comments about vibrating.

PAD_Notice.synopsis: In the Underdark there's a grave at Sussur Tree. Digging the grave unveils a collar of a pet dog. This collar has no use on the first sight, at least there's no magical properties. This AD happens when the collar is dropped from the grave.

PAD_FeedButton_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FeedButton_0.text: Wait - why did my collar just vibrate?
PAD_FeedButton_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Feed button didn't work, but one of nearby characters felt the pet's collar vibrating on its neck.NodeContext: Someone else pressed a button and surprisingly, it made a collar you're wearing vibrate.

PAD_FeedButton_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FeedButton_1.text: Hmm - only one serving for me, I guess.
PAD_FeedButton_1.context: InternalNodeContext: The feed button doesn't work anymore. It only gave food once so player wouldnt abuse this situation.

PAD_FeedButton_2.speaker: Player
PAD_FeedButton_2.text: Strange place for a button. Especially one that doesn't work.
PAD_FeedButton_2.context: InternalNodeContext: None of nearby characters have the collar in inventory: give a hint that the button is designed for some small creature to press.

PAD_FeedButton_3.speaker: Player
PAD_FeedButton_3.text: Clever. Food is dispensed for anyone wearing this collar.
PAD_FeedButton_3.context: InternalNodeContext: The feed button worked, this means character who pressed the button had pet's collar on. And this character is commenting.

PAD_FeedButton_4.speaker: Player
PAD_FeedButton_4.text: Wait - why did that strange dog collar just vibrate?
PAD_FeedButton_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Feed button didn't work, but one of nearby characters felt the pet's collar vibrating in its pocket.NodeContext: Someone else pressed a button and surprisingly, it made a collar you're carrying in your pocket vibrate.

PAD_Notice_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Notice_2.text: Strange collar... it's got runes all over it.
PAD_Notice_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has no idea whose grave and collar was found, but sees magical inscriptions on it.

PAD_Notice_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Notice_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has no idea whose grave and collar was found, but sees magical inscriptions on it.

PAD_Notice_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Notice_1.text: Must have belonged to Lenore's dog.
PAD_Notice_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has seen cleric's letter which describes the loss of beloved dog and placement of its grave.
